channel.title: Basic primitive sword and how to make takes 5 mins
channel.description:
ok people who dont know how to primitive model look below, [img]http://falloutscape.yolasite.com/resources/primitive%20sword.bmp[/img] that is a primitive modeled sword. if you never primitive modeled correctly your probally asking your self how come it doesnt look like a square. that is because i extruded faces and subsurfed the whole object. extruding is very easy just select a face and move your mouse right or left. and for subsurf here is a link below. [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,367415.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,367415.0.html[/url] What are some advantages of primitive modeling? primitive modeling can make anything a trace can. there will never be messed up faces. and can be very cool to mess with, you just need to picture something in your mind to make it.
if you want to see how i did this model you can download the sword above with this link. dl link: http://uppit.com/v/NG9825LC
enjoi any critisism will probally not be taken since i did it in 5 mins.

cocoa:

Ya, mine kind of sucked ^^

i was ready to puke when i saw yours.

Nice tut, now ill actually see models i can REALLY criticize. i like criticizing prim models more than traces.

Read full topic
